main event: On May 6, 1952, in Cyprus, a luminous, circular-shaped object was observed by British servicemen and ground police, rising sharply from the level of the sea and moving rapidly before fading out of sight directly overhead.
interesting points: The UFO sighting involved a group of people, including British servicemen and ground police, making the observation more credible.
The object emitted a luminous light and appeared to be moving at a very rapid rate of speed, with no air traffic in the vicinity at the time.
The UFO report suggests the possibility of it being a balloon, aircraft, or unidentified object, leaving the conclusion inconclusive.
The object was observed to wave back and forth before fading out of sight, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
This sighting was documented and approved by senior USAF personnel, giving it additional validation.
witnesses: British servicemen, ground police, and USAF personnel
photographs: no photograph present in the report
